headline: Best Quant-rated small- and mid-cap healthcare stocks as LLY hits $1T in market cap
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: "Cash, what are the top picks in small- and mid-cap healthcare as LLY reaches that monumental $1 trillion milestone?"

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: It seems the retail world is about to face some serious shake-ups—hold onto your shopping carts!

timeline.speaker: cash
timeline.text: The rise of LLY to a $1 trillion market cap highlights increasing investor confidence in the healthcare sector. As small- and mid-cap stocks get a nod from quantitative analysts, it suggests a potential shift towards more diverse investment strategies. This trend could reshape market dynamics as investors seek opportunities beyond large-cap stalwarts.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Turning now to developments in the healthcare sector.
